DOC.brief_summary: Background : Previous study Internet-based treatment eat disorder show promising result . Objective : The first aim study investigate effect tailor therapist guide internet-based treatment individual eat disorder . The second aim examine role knowledge acquisition . Method : 138 participant recruit . Screening consisted online questionnaire follow telephone interview . A total 92 participant include semi-structured diagnostic interview randomize 8 week treatment program ( n=46 ) control condition ( n=46 ) . Treatment consist individually prescribe cognitive behaviour therapy text module conjunction online therapist guidance . The control group consist waitlist later receive treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Individually Tailored Web-based Cbt Eating Disorders Role Knowledge Acquisition
DOC.criteria: Have reoccurring eat disorder un bulimia BMI 17,5 Suicide prone Ongoing psychological treatment
